subject: Order Status Inquiry – Haptic Pedal Sensors
description_text:
Hello,


I placed an order for the haptic pedal sensors on your website, and
according to the tracking information, the package has been marked as in
transit / on the way for about two weeks now. Since there has been no
update in the tracking status, I am a bit concerned and would like to know
more about the current location and estimated delivery time of my order.


Could you please provide me with an update on the shipping status?


Thank you very much for your help.


Best regards,

Alexi Vigeant

conversations.body_text: Hi Alexi Vigeant,  Your parcel appears to have been placed at a collection point. It is possible the courier was unable to contact you. Please check your letterbox for any notification cards they may have left. If none are found, kindly contact Canada Post. Here is your tracking number: 1029777130304828     Call：1-866-607-6301  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=1029777130304828
